product_name: Vittoria Open Corsa Evo CX Tire - 700 x 23
long_description: The Vittoria Open Corsa Evo CX road tire has proven success in road races all over the world. It features a "handmade" structure for superior performance and comfort. Kevlar(R) 3D compound with silica reduces rolling resistance and offers excellent grip on wet roads. High-density 320 TPI casing delivers unbeatable comfort and superior performance with high inflation pressure. Puncture-resistant belting placed underneath the tread increases flat prevention properties up to 40% while reducing tire's overall weight.
short_description: The Vittoria Open Corsa Evo CX road tire has proven success in road races all over the world. It features a "handmade" structure for superior performance and comfort.
